Member Documentation

Algorithm { Md5 , Md4 }

ConstantDescription
Md5
Md4




QxtHash ( Algorithm algo )

constructs a new hash with Algorithm algo




QxtHash ( Algorithm algo , const QByteArray & data )

constructs a new hash with Algorithm algo and reads the data data




void append ( const QByteArray & dt )

appends the data dt to the current data




void operator+= ( const QByteArray & dt )

appends the data dt to the current data




void reset ( )

resets teh hash, deletes all data




QByteArray hash ( )

returns the resulting hash
